page.title: 13WHITGREAVE A LOCAL VILLAGE.
page.content: is timber framed. We visited the majority of the houses;the total population being about 75 of whom about one third are children.Half the population had come to the village in the last five years,most having lived fairly near before moving.Three houses are for sale. Only about one third are working full time.8 are manual workers(farming building or carpentry).The others work in offices or schools,though there were also a student,a sales director,,a scientific officer,a printer and a landscape gardener.Three quarters work within 10 miles of their home. The very great majority had their own transport,cars being the most common.One main reason for this is
